rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: In a pandemic, vaccine manufacturers would shift production of seasonal flu vaccines and instead make shots tailored to the new outbreak when needed. They [vaccine manufacturers] already have the capacity to make hundreds of millions of doses.
